thread.title: Luck to miss 1st NFL game as Indianapolis faces Jacksonville
thread.title_full: Luck to miss 1st NFL game as Indianapolis faces Jacksonville

title: Luck to miss 1st NFL game as Indianapolis faces Jacksonville
text:
> Indiana Luck to miss 1st NFL game as Indianapolis faces Jacksonville Indianapolis Colts' Andrew Luck, right,, runs before the start of an NFL football game between the Indianapolis Colts and the Jacksonville Jaguars, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Indianapolis. Luck is inactive Sunday and will miss his first NFL game because of a right shoulder injury. Matt Hasselbeck, left, will start in place of Luck.
